directions: Mix pineapple juice, coconut-flavored rum, vodka, orange juice concentrate, pink lemonade concentrate, black tea, and grenadine together in a freezer-safe container.
Freeze mixture, stirring occasionally, until frozen, about 24 hours. Serve slushie in a glass and top with lemon-lime beverage.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (6 ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate
1/4 cup lemon-lime carbonated beverage, or as needed
title: Coconut Rum Slushie
